description:
Free version. If you like this app and want to reward me, you can buy the paid version.

The best tool for finding bicycle sharing services and stations in your city (+70 cities available)! Today, lots of cities provide fast, clean and secure services for the general population and for the tourists to rent a bike such as London (Barclays), Washington DC (Capital bikeshare), Montreal (Bixi), Mexico (EcoBici), Bordeaux (Vcub), Barcelone (Bicing)... Check the full list of the cities available on the website. Use "Bike Sharing" to: - Find stations nearby your location, or specific place; - Get instant updates on the number of available bikes in each station; - Save time by checking the best station to return your bike (empty slots available). - View stations and availabilities on a full map (zoom in and out); - Bookmark your favorite stations for quick access - Choose any city that has this service and find your bike! Translated in english, french, spanish & italian!
